A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst star wars film ever produced\, possibly the worst film ever made. It is superficial where it attempts depth\, it is clumsy when it attempts to be sober. It has no story to speak of\, and where it is even coherent one might well wish it were not. You can see the mistakes coming a mile off\, and just have to sit there saying\, 'don't do it'. But\, in the end\, you just know they're going to do it.
